channel.title: Getting Started with Brights on Brightsec
channel.description: Recent content in Getting Started with Brights on Brightsec

item.title: Quick Tour of the User Interface
item.description:
[block:html] { “html”: “<table id="simple-table">

 
 
 <th width="25%">Option
 <th width="75%">Description
 
 
 <td width="25%"><img src="https://files.readme.io/2d67c8a-scans.png" width="23" height="21">&nbsp&nbsp&nbspScans
 <td width="75%">
 This option enables you to view a list of previously run scans, currently run scans and future scheduled scans. It also allows you to define and schedule new scans, as well as to modify and rerun existing scans. 
 You can save and reuse a set of scan settings as a template to start another scan quickly.

item.title: Quickstart
